snippet: Kirk Urso, 22, a rookie midfielder for the Columbus Crew of Major League Soccer, died Sunday in a Columbus, Ohio, hospital; a Nigerian player, Chinonso Ihelwere Henry of F.C. Tulcea, collapsed and died.
abstract: Kirk Urso, 22, a rookie midfielder for the Columbus Crew of Major League Soccer, dies in a Columbus, Ohio, hospital; no cause of death has been determined.
lead_paragraph: Kirk Urso, 22, a rookie midfielder for the Columbus Crew of Major League Soccer, died Sunday in a Columbus, Ohio, hospital; a Nigerian player, Chinonso Ihelwere Henry of F.C. Tulcea, collapsed and died.

headline.main: Columbus Midfielder and Nigerian Player Die
headline.print_headline: Columbus Midfielder And Nigerian Player Die
